name: Dove (WIP)
description:
!!!THE GAME IS NOT COMPLETE!!! 
While you can still play and finish the game, a lot of art has not been implemented yet so it's all placeholders I doodled on MS Paint. Play at your own risk (those doodles are an experience).

Theodore is your typical guy trying to sleep through the entirety of summer break in peace until a persistent dove forces him out of the house and on to familiar decors that remind him of his past friendship with an atypical guy called Henry. A simple and short visual novel with hidden object elements and three possible endings.

This was done for the Pixelles Game Incubator 10, where the goal is to learn and make a game in 8 weeks. I've worked in QA for many years now and thought using Ren'py would make it easier somehow??? I was wrong and foolish. Coding is hard. 8') I do plan to finish it still, just........................... definitely not tomorrow which is the event's deadline lmao

The game is free to play, especially considering its current WIP state, but as someone who has spent way too much time on every single aspect of this game I couldn't just NOT put a tip option. ;_; No pressure though, feel free to play for free!!

SEE CREDITS IN THE "CREDITS" SECTION IN-GAME
